page.title: 08POPLAR FARM
page.content: The first thing we came to was some fields of{wheat.}The fields of wheat are{sold for cash.}These wheat fields belong to{I.C.I.}We saw lots of fields of{grazing}grass. Some of it was very green and lush. Some of the grass was very rough with thistles and nettles growing in it. We saw some{pigs}in a field next to{Poplar Farm.}Some of them ran in and out of the{farrowing huts. We can see{High Court Green Farm which is{derelict}but it is used for keeping cows. There is some fields of sheep grazing. We saw two tractors. All the walls in this area are made of sandstone.{Moordale Beck}runs through this area and forms part of the boundary between two of the main land owners.
